original_text: I have used wisdom to study all these things. I tried very much to understand everything that happens. But I could not do it. I have used wisdom to study all these things. I tried very much to understand everything that happens. But I could not do it. I have used wisdom to study all these things. I tried very much to understand everything that happens. But I could not do it. I have used wisdom to study all these things.
korean_text: 내가 이 모든 것을 지혜로 시험하며 스스로 이르기를 내가 지혜자가 되리라 하였으나 지혜가 나를 멀리 하였도다

sentences.original_text: I have used wisdom to study all these things.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 지혜를 사용하여 이 모든 것들을 연구했습니다.

sentences.original_text: I tried very much to understand everything that happens.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 일어나는 모든 것을 이해하기 위해 매우 노력했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But I could not do it.
